requestBody.description: Details of the new user to register

put.description: Updated user information for current user

requestBody.description: User details to update. At least **one** field is required.

get.description: Get a profile of a user of the system. Auth is optional

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of the profile to get

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of the profile you want to follow

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of the profile you want to unfollow

get.summary: Get recent articles from users you follow
get.description: Get most recent articles from users you follow. Use query parameters to limit. Auth is required

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit number of articles returned (default is 20)

get.description: Get most recent articles globally. Use query parameters to filter results. Auth is optional

parameters.name: favorited
parameters.description: Filter by favorites of a user (username)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit number of articles returned (default is 20)

post.description: Create an article. Auth is required

get.description: Get an article. Auth not required

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Slug of the article to get

put.description: Update an article. Auth is required

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Slug of the article to update

delete.description: Delete an article. Auth is required

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Slug of the article to delete

get.description: Get the comments for an article. Auth is optional

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Slug of the article that you want to get comments for

post.summary: Create a comment for an article
post.description: Create a comment for an article. Auth is required

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Slug of the article that you want to create a comment for

delete.summary: Delete a comment for an article
delete.description: Delete a comment for an article. Auth is required

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Slug of the article that you want to delete a comment for

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the comment you want to delete

post.description: Favorite an article. Auth is required

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Slug of the article that you want to favorite

delete.description: Unfavorite an article. Auth is required

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Slug of the article that you want to unfavorite

Token.description:
For accessing the protected API resources, you must have received a a valid JWT token after registering or logging in. This JWT token must then be used for all protected resources by passing it in via the 'Authorization' header.

A JWT token is generated by the API by either registering via /users or logging in via /users/login.

The following format must be in the 'Authorization' header :

    Token: xxxxxx.yyyyyyy.zzzzzz
Token.name: Authorization
